description: User cannot send emails from Outlook client
resolution_notes: Reset email client configuration and verified SMTP settings. Issue resolved.

description: Network speed extremely slow in Building A
resolution_notes: Restarted network switch on Floor 3. Checked cables and found loose connection. Secured connection and verified speed.

description: Desktop computer in Room 205 won't start up
resolution_notes: Diagnosed power supply failure. Replaced power supply unit. System boots normally now.

description: User cannot access Z: drive (shared folder)
resolution_notes: Reset user permissions on file server. Verified group membership. User can now access shared drive.

description: Color printer on Floor 2 not responding
resolution_notes: Cleared paper jam and replaced toner cartridge. Restarted printer service. Test print successful.
Reinstalled application and updated to latest version. Verified database connection settings. Application runs normally.

description: User forgot login password for system
resolution_notes: Verified user identity and reset password through AD. User successfully logged in with new password.
Updated graphics driver to latest version. Adjusted display refresh rate. Flickering resolved.

description: Cannot connect to corporate VPN from home
resolution_notes: Reconfigured VPN client settings. Updated VPN certificate. Connection established successfully.
Rebuilt Outlook profile and reconfigured email account. Started full sync. Emails syncing normally.
Restarted IIS web server. Cleared DNS cache on affected computers. Website accessible now.
Rebooted file server. Checked disk health. All services running. Users can access files.
Updated license key with new corporate license. Verified activation. Software fully licensed.
Replaced keyboard batteries. Re-paired keyboard with receiver. Keyboard functioning normally.
Adjusted spam filter settings. Added sender domains to blocklist. Trained spam filter. Spam reduced significantly.
Tested with different cable. Replaced HDMI cable. Monitor detected and displays correctly.

description: Error when installing new software package
resolution_notes: Ran installer with admin privileges. Disabled antivirus temporarily. Software installed successfully.
Increased connection timeout in app config. Optimized slow queries. Connection stable now.
Restarted phone server. Checked network connectivity. All phones registered and working.
Manually downloaded definitions. Configured update schedule. Antivirus updating automatically.
